alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 500 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Orangetree, or near Golden Gate Estates, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lely, South Blocks Golde, Picayune Strand State Forest and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
